statements: SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status='Open';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id=12345;
SELECT ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE resolution_date IS NULL;
SELECT ticket_id, creation_date FROM support_tickets ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM support_tickets;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, creation_date FROM support_tickets WHERE resolution_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Closed' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE resolution_date IS NOT NULL AND resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 12345 ORDER BY resolution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, status, created_at FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_tickets DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS ticket_count FROM tickets GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE agent_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, category, created_at FROM tickets WHERE category = 'Technical Issue' AND status = 'Open' ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT tickets.ticket_id, tickets.category, interactions.agent_id FROM tickets INNER JOIN interactions ON tickets.ticket_id = interactions.ticket_id WHERE tickets.status = 'In Progress' AND interactions.agent_id = 101 ORDER BY interactions.interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS ticket_count FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(ticket_id) > 3 ORDER BY ticket_count DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, MAX(interaction_timestamp) AS last_interaction FROM interactions GROUP BY ticket_id HAVING COUNT(interaction_id) > 1 ORDER BY last_interaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_id, priority, status FROM tickets WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ticket_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Update';
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT ticket_id, priority, created_at FROM tickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT interactions.interaction_id, interactions.interaction_type, tickets.customer_id FROM interactions INNER JOIN tickets ON interactions.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id WHERE interactions.interaction_type='Comment';

SELECT customers.name, tickets.priority, interactions.interaction_details FROM customers INNER JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id INNER JOIN interactions ON tickets.ticket_id = interactions.ticket_id WHERE customers.name='John Doe';

SELECT interactions.interaction_id, interactions.interaction_type, tickets.customer_id, customers.phone_number FROM interactions INNER JOIN tickets ON interactions.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id INNER JOIN customers ON tickets.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE tickets.priority='High' AND customers.email='john.doe@example.com';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_status, created_at FROM tickets;
SELECT interaction_id, ticket_id, interaction_type, interaction_text FROM interactions;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, department FROM agents;
SELECT ticket_id, resolved_at FROM tickets;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, created_at FROM tickets WHERE resolved_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-12-31';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_text, created_at FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'comment' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM agents WHERE department = 'Customer Support' ORDER BY agent_name;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, status FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM agents WHERE department = 'Support';
SELECT interaction_id, ticket_id, interaction_time FROM interactions WHERE interaction_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, priority FROM tickets WHERE priority = 'High';
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.customer_name, n.note_text FROM tickets t JOIN notes n ON t.ticket_id = n.ticket_id;

SELECT a.agent_name, t.customer_name, n.note_text FROM agents a JOIN assignments ass ON a.agent_id = ass.agent_id JOIN tickets t ON ass.ticket_id = t.ticket_id JOIN notes n ON t.ticket_id = n.ticket_id;
SELECT t.customer_name, i.interaction_time, i.interaction_details FROM tickets t JOIN interactions i ON t.ticket_id = i.ticket_id WHERE t.customer_name = 'Alice';
